imdb.title: A glimpse insight into the mind of Charlie Baker
akas: A glimpse insight into the mind of Charlie Baker (United Kingdom)
plot: Charlie Baker (Sebastian Perkes) is suicidal and depressed after the suicide of his mother. The only way out of his sorrow are drugs. This habit gets him into trouble with the wrong people. Can he change his life before it is too late?
